subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: From their front-row seats in a private box, Sandy Sadler and her Baton Rouge, La., pals scanned Arthur Ashe Stadium and plotted a return visit.
snippet: From their front-row seats in a private box, Sandy Sadler and her Baton Rouge, La., pals scanned Arthur Ashe Stadium and plotted a return visit.
